lead_paragraph: Ban Ki-moon said he had not decided whether to seek the presidency of his country, but his remarks were the closest he has come to saying he might.

headline.print_headline: U.N. Leader Evasive on Presidential Bid in South Korea
headline.main: Departing U.N. Leader Evasive on Possible Run for President of South Korea

snippet: Ban Ki-moon said he had not decided whether to seek the presidency of his country, but his remarks were the closest he has come to saying he might....
